Never mind I think I know how
For people who don't know how to install here are the steps:
1) Choose a location ( I chose C:Downloads)
2) When you finish downloading the game there    should be a winrar type file there @ C:Downloads
3) Double click the file
4) You'll find uharc.exe, setup.bat, Data1.uha, Data2.uha and Data3.uha
5) If you click uharc.exe it will load a screen for about 1 sec. then it will disappear so go to setup.bat it will tell that files uharc.exe, Data.uha 1,2,3 will be missing from C:Downloads
6) To fix this just highlight and drag them to where you save the NFSU2 winrar type file(for me C:Downloads).
6) Run setup.bat again it will decompress the file.
7) You will have to create a new folder and send all of the applications, folders etc. into the folder
8) Although you can't move speed2 it will say create link.
9)Play the game, It's a long process, but I'm sure all of you can figure it out =)

For people who don't know how to play the game
Run uharc.exe; you'll see a black screen for about 1 sec then it dissapears thats good it means that it decompressed. Then run setup.bat(it will show you what to do) and if you have any questions from there you can ask me.
